010package imagingbook.common.corners;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.convolveX;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.convolveY;
014import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Collections;
018import java.util.List;
019
020import ij.plugin.filter.Convolver;
021import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
022import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
023import imagingbook.common.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator;
024import imagingbook.common.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method;
025import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
026import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.LinearFilterSeparable;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
028import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMath;
029import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
030
031/**
032 * Abstract super class for all corner detectors based on local 
033 * structure tensor.
034 * This is the superclass for various concrete implementations:
035 * {@link HarrisCornerDetector},
036 * {@link ShiTomasiCornerDetector},
037 * {@link MopsCornerDetector}.
038 * 
039 * TODO: replace 'border' by ROI rectangle
040 * 
041 * @author W. Burger
042 * @version 2022/03/30
043 * 
044 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
045 * @see MopsCornerDetector
046 * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
047 */
048public abstract class GradientCornerDetector {
049        
050        /** For testing/example calculations only! */
051        public static boolean RETAIN_TEMPORARY_DATA = false;
052        
053        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
054                @DialogLabel("Apply pre-filter")
055                public boolean doPreFilter = true;
056                
057                @DialogLabel("Gaussian smoothing radius (\u03C3)")@DialogDigits(3)
058                public double sigma = 1.275;
059                
060                @DialogLabel("Border margins")
061                public int border = 20;
062                
063                @DialogLabel("Clean up corners")
064                public boolean doCleanUp = true;
065                
066                @DialogLabel("Min. distance between final corners")@DialogDigits(1)
067                public double dmin = 10;
068                
069                @DialogLabel("Subpixel localization method")
070                public Method maxLocatorMethod = Method.None;
071                
072                @DialogLabel("Corner response threshold (th)")@DialogDigits(1)
073                public double scoreThreshold = 100;
074                
075                @Override
076                public boolean validate() {
077                        return sigma > 0 && border >= 0 && dmin >= 0 && scoreThreshold > 0;
078                }
079        }
080        
081        protected static final float UndefinedScoreValue = 0;   // to be returned when corner score is undefined
082        
083        //filter kernels (one-dim. part of separable 2D filters)
084        private final static float[] hp = {2f/9, 5f/9, 2f/9};           // pre-smoothing filter kernel
085        private final static float[] hd = {0.5f, 0, -0.5f};                     // first-derivative kernel
086//      private final static float[] hb = {1f/64, 6f/64, 15f/64, 20f/64, 15f/64, 6f/64, 1f/64}; // original gradient blur filter kernel
087        
088        protected final int M, N;
089        protected final Parameters params;
090        protected final FloatProcessor Q;
091        
092        private final SubpixelMaxInterpolator maxLocator;
093//      private final List<Corner> corners;
094        
095        // retained mainly for debugging
096        private FloatProcessor A = null;
097        private FloatProcessor B = null;
098        private FloatProcessor C = null;
099        
100        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
101        
102        protected GradientCornerDetector(ImageProcessor ip, Parameters params) {
103                this.M = ip.getWidth();
104                this.N = ip.getHeight();
105                this.params = params;
106                this.maxLocator = (params.maxLocatorMethod == Method.None) ? null : 
107                        SubpixelMaxInterpolator.getInstance(params.maxLocatorMethod);
108                this.Q = makeCornerScores(ip);
109        }
110        
111        /**
112         * Calculates the corner response score for a single image position (u,v)
113         * from the elements A, B, C of the local structure matrix.
114         * The method should normalize the score value, such that 100
115         * is returned for the default threshold value.
116         * To be implemented by concrete sub-classes.
117         * 
118         * @see HarrisCornerDetector
119         * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
120         * @param A = Ixx(u,v)
121         * @param B = Iyy(u,v)
122         * @param C = Ixy(u,v)
123         * @return the corner score
124         */
125        protected abstract float getCornerScore(float A, float B, float C);
126        
127        // -------------------------------------------------------------
128        
129        private FloatProcessor makeCornerScores(ImageProcessor I) {
130                FloatProcessor Ix = I.convertToFloatProcessor(); 
131                FloatProcessor Iy = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
132                
133                Convolver conv = new Convolver();
134                conv.setNormalize(false);
135                
136                // nothing really but a Sobel-type gradient:
137                if (params.doPreFilter) {
138                        convolveY(Ix, hp);                      // pre-filter Ix vertically
139                        convolveX(Iy, hp);                      // pre-filter Iy horizontally
140                }
141                
142                convolveX(Ix, hd);                              // get first derivative in x
143                convolveY(Iy, hd);                              // get first derivative in y
144                
145                // gradient products:
146                A = ImageMath.sqr(Ix);                          // A(u,v) = Ixx(u,v) = (Ix(u,v))^2
147                B = ImageMath.sqr(Iy);                          // B(u,v) = Iyy(u,v) = (Iy(u,v))^2
148                C = ImageMath.mult(Ix, Iy);                     // C(u,v) = Ixy(u,v) = Ix(u,v)*Iy(u,v)
149                
150                // blur the gradient components with a small Gaussian:
151                LinearFilterSeparable gf = new GaussianFilterSeparable(params.sigma);
152                gf.applyTo(A);
153                gf.applyTo(B);
154                gf.applyTo(C);
155                
156                FloatProcessor Q = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
157                
158                final float[] pA = (float[]) A.getPixels();
159                final float[] pB = (float[]) B.getPixels();
160                final float[] pC = (float[]) C.getPixels();
161                final float[] pQ = (float[]) Q.getPixels();
162                
163                for (int i = 0; i < M * N; i++) {
164                        pQ[i] = getCornerScore(pA[i], pB[i], pC[i]);
165                }
166                
167                return Q;
168        }
169        
170
171        /**
172         * Returns the corner score function as a {@link FloatProcessor} object.
173         * @return the score function
174         */
175        public FloatProcessor getQ() {
176                return this.Q;
177        }
178        
179        public FloatProcessor getA() {
180                return this.A;
181        }
182        
183        public FloatProcessor getB() {
184                return this.B;
185        }
186        
187        public FloatProcessor getC() {
188                return this.C;
189        }
190        
191        public List<Corner> getCorners() {
192                List<Corner> cl = collectCorners(params.scoreThreshold, params.border);
193                if (params.doCleanUp) {
194                        cl = cleanupCorners(cl);
195                }
196                return cl;
197        }
198        
199        // ----------------------------------------------------------
200        
201        /*
202         * Returned samples are arranged as follows:
203         *      s4 s3 s2
204         *  s5 s0 s1
205         *  s6 s7 s8
206         */
207        private float[] getNeighborhood(FloatProcessor Q, int u, int v) {
208                if (u <= 0 || u >= M - 1 || v <= 0 || v >= N - 1) {
209                        return null;
210                } 
211                else {
212                        final float[] q = (float[]) Q.getPixels();
213                        float[] s = new float[9];
214                        final int i0 = (v - 1) * M + u;
215                        final int i1 = v * M + u;
216                        final int i2 = (v + 1) * M + u;
217                        s[0] = q[i1];
218                        s[1] = q[i1 + 1];
219                        s[2] = q[i0 + 1];
220                        s[3] = q[i0];
221                        s[4] = q[i0 - 1];
222                        s[5] = q[i1 - 1];
223                        s[6] = q[i2 - 1];
224                        s[7] = q[i2];
225                        s[8] = q[i2 + 1];
226                        return s;
227                }
228        }
229        
230        private boolean isLocalMax(float[] s) {
231                if (s == null) {
232                        return false;
233                }
234                else {
235                        final float s0 = s[0];
236                        return  // check 8 neighbors of q0
237                                        s0 > s[4] && s0 > s[3] && s0 > s[2] &&
238                                        s0 > s[5] &&              s0 > s[1] && 
239                                        s0 > s[6] && s0 > s[7] && s0 > s[8] ;
240                }
241        }
242        
243        private List<Corner> collectCorners(double scoreThreshold, int borderWidth) {
244                float th = (float) scoreThreshold; //params.scoreThreshold;
245                //int border = params.border;
246                List<Corner> C = new ArrayList<>();
247                for (int v = borderWidth; v < N - borderWidth; v++) {
248                        for (int u = borderWidth; u < M - borderWidth; u++) {
249                                float[] qn = getNeighborhood(Q, u, v);
250                                if (qn != null && qn[0] > th && isLocalMax(qn)) {
251                                        Corner c = makeCorner(u, v, qn);
252                                        if (c != null) {
253                                                C.add(c);
254                                        }
255                                }
256                        }
257                }
258                return C;
259        }
260        
261        private List<Corner> cleanupCorners(List<Corner> C) {
262                final double dmin2 = sqr(params.dmin);
263                // sort corners by descending q-value:
264                Collections.sort(C);
265                // we use an array of corners for efficiency reasons:
266                Corner[] Ca = C.toArray(new Corner[C.size()]);
267                List<Corner> Cclean = new ArrayList<>(C.size());
268                for (int i = 0; i < Ca.length; i++) {
269                        Corner c0 = Ca[i];              // get next strongest corner
270                        if (c0 != null) {
271                                Cclean.add(c0);
272                                // delete all remaining corners cj too close to c0:
273                                for (int j = i + 1; j < Ca.length; j++) {
274                                        Corner cj = Ca[j];
275                                        if (cj != null && c0.distanceSq(cj) < dmin2)
276                                                Ca[j] = null;   //delete corner cj from C
277                                }
278                        }
279                }
280                return Cclean;
281        }
282        
283        /**
284         * Creates a new {@link Corner} instance. Performs sub-pixel
285         * position refinement if a {@link #maxLocator} is defined.
286         * @param u the corner's horizontal position (int)
287         * @param v the corner's vertical position (int)
288         * @param qn the 9 corner scores in the 3x3 neighborhood
289         * @return a new {@link Corner} instance
290         */
291        private Corner makeCorner(int u, int v, float[] qn) {
292                if (maxLocator == null) {
293                        // no sub-pixel refinement, use original integer coordinates
294                        return new Corner(u, v, qn[0]);
295                }
296                else {
297                        // do sub-pixel refinement
298                        float[] xyz = maxLocator.getMax(qn);
299                        return (xyz == null) ? null : new Corner(u + xyz[0], v + xyz[1], xyz[2]);
300                }
301        }
302        
303        
304}
